RelatedSentence: An unparalleled offering of Limousin females met a truly insatiable demand at Newark on Saturday ( 17 May ) when the centre recorded its second 100 % clearance of Limousin breeding stock in five weeks .

A1: herds , had seen interest from far and wide
RelatedSentence: Auctioneers Paul Gentry said this week 's sale which included the dispersal of the Pennys and Birdies herds , as well as drafts from the Ironstone , Rachels , Scorboro , Threaphurst , Bosworth , Charleston and Bowtells herds , had seen interest from far and wide and buyers willing to invest strongly in what was arguably the finest collective offering of Limousin genetics this summer .

Auctioneers Paul Gentry said this week 's sale which included the dispersal of the Pennys and Birdies herds , as well as drafts from the Ironstone , Rachels , Scorboro , Threaphurst , Bosworth , Charleston and Bowtells herds , had seen interest from far and wide and buyers willing to invest strongly in what was arguably the finest collective offering of Limousin genetics this summer .

Once again Newark has proven itself as the place to sell pedigree stock , we have the facilities and the staff to offer a top class service and coupled with that we have a strong following of loyal buyers willing and ready to invest in the right breeding stock .

Leading the prices on Saturday was the September 2007 - born Uruguay daughter Clochette from William Bird 's Birdis herd dispersal .
This one is out of the Mercator daughter Urne and sold Pd 'd four to five months in-calf again to Brutus .
Mr Sawrij also took her heifer calf , Birdies Isabeau at 3800gns , with this one being an April 2013 - born Brutus daughter .
This Scorboro Aramis daughter , originally bred by Jim Bloom , is out of the Ronick Upshot daughter Scorboro Aramia .
The same buyers then paid 8000gns for Corridan Diamond , an October 2008 - born daughter of Corridan Arkle from the Birdies dispersal .
A 7500gns bid then saw the Gascoines Group back in spending mood securing Bailgate Flavia again from the Birdies dispersal .
And making 6200gns was the the Objat daughter , Newmarque Fleur , also from William Bird , who found a new home with George McCague , Newry , Northern Ireland , at 6200gns .
This one is out of a Rocky daughter , Newmarque Celia and carries a beef value of +38 .
At 5000gns Mark Phillips , Castle Douglas , purchased Corridan Delphinium , once again from the Birdies herd .

A1: the Birdies herd stock bull , Brutus ,
RelatedSentence: A 4800gns was enough to buy the Birdies herd stock bull , Brutus , with this Usty son being out of Hirondelle , an Espoir daughter .
Next up at 4500gns was Confluence Dixie , a Dauphin daughter out of Rachels Anne , a Ronick upshot daughter who carries Ronick Iceman on the dam side .
She sold empty , but her Brutus heifer calf , Birdies Ingrid , went at 3000gns to J H Tennant .
